question_text: Which of the following best describes how NVMe improves performance over AHCI?
answer_options: By compressing all file transfers before writing
By reducing the number of electrical pins required
By supporting parallel command queues and lower latency
By requiring no drivers for any operating system
correct_answer: By supporting parallel command queues and lower latency
explanation: NVMe allows for thousands of simultaneous command queues compared to AHCI's single-queue model, greatly improving performance.
